list_definition.definition: a bag of cloth etc filled with soft material, eg feathers etc, used for support or to make a seat more comfortable

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ll sit on a cushion on the floor.
A hovercraft travels on a cushion of air.

list_definition.definition: to lessen the force of a blow etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The soft sand cushioned his fall.

list_ex_of_english: Recently, by buying a certain brand of flour the housewife could get easy chairs, coffee tables, rugs and cushions.
